subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN1570 is on the way
description_text:
Hi Simsonn,

I received the VAM Pro on Monday and when I opened the box it was missing
the Carbon Fiber Heel Plate.

Was that getting shipped together or separate?

Thanks

Nick

---
Items in this shipment:
Carbon Fiber Heel Plate × 1
Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback × 1
VAM Pro (Purchase Power Supply Separately)

conversations.body_text: Hi Nick, Sorry for the inconvenience, I checked with our warehouse associates and the two items cannot be shipped together, they missed the Carbon Fiber Heel Plate, we can either refund you or reship the item, sorry for the inconvenience.

Hi,

Can you please refund

Thanks.
Hi Nick, Okay, we've refunded you, please check it out, it's expected to arrive in two days.
That's great, thank you very much.
